Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:23#15#mooncrest noruks} are overgrazing the Lake of Tears. We need their hides, so this is a happy marriage of desire and mission.

Kill the noruks and take their hides to Lorsha when you're done.
These skins will make fine suits of armor. You have my thanks.
Kill the {@LinkCreature:23#15#mooncrest noruks} and bring me their hides.
